external_references.description: Venere, G. Neal, C. (2022, June 21). Avos ransomware group expands with new attack arsenal. Retrieved January 11, 2023.

description: For [C0018](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0018), the threat actors renamed a [Sliver](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0633) payload to `vmware_kb.exe`.(Citation: Cisco Talos Avos Jun 2022)
